Replicate {3} [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.)[/i]
When Powered Replicatron enters, create a tapped Powerstone token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.)[/i] [i](It's an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”)[/i]
